markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cantrip Deck](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1046)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 181 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

In an effort to spread the knowledge of magic as widely as possible, worshippers of [Nethys](/Deities.aspx?ID=12) discovered a way to bind cantrips into cards accessible even to non-spellcasters. The deck contains thick parchment cards, each roughly half the size of a playing card. In precise, no-nonsense script, each card simply states the name of its cantrip, color-coded based on its school.

<document level="2" id="action-836" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cantrip Deck (5-Pack)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 181 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This pack contains 5 cards of a single common cantrip (such as [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171)).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cantrip Deck (Full Pack)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 181 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This pack contains 24 cards—one of each cantrip in the _Core Rulebook_.

[_Acid splash_](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [_chill touch_](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [_dancing lights_](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [_daze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [_disrupt undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=79), [_divine lance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [_electric arc_](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [_forbidding ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [_ghost sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [_know direction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [_mage hand_](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [_message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [_prestidigitation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [_ray of frost_](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [_sigil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=286), [_stabilize_](/Spells.aspx?ID=307), [_tanglefoot_](/Spells.aspx?ID=330), [_telekinetic projectile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
name: Cantrip Deck
